languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Imperialis — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack damage against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Imperialis rank</u>.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——信奉者
每当敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}装备者时，装备者对该名敌人的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}远程攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高5%。如果目标是恶魔或异形，则此效果提高<u>“教条主义”等级</u>倍。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：帝国主义——信奉者
每当敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}装备者时，装备者对该名敌人的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击造成的伤害提高5%。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}如果目标是恶魔或异形，则此效果提高<u>“帝国主义”等级</u>倍。

需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——信奉者
每当敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}装备者时，装备者对该名敌人的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高5%。如果目标是恶魔或异形，则此效果提高<u>“教条主义”等级</u>倍。

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — поборник
Получая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от противника, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} 5% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, который он наносит этому противнику дистанционными атаками. Если противник является демоном или ксеносом, бонус умножается на <u>ранг Догматика</u>.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Требуется: Империум — поборник
Получая {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} от противника, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} 5% к урону, который он наносит этому противнику {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционными{/g} атаками. Если противник является демоном или ксеносом, бонус увеличивается в <u>уровень Империума</u> раз.

Требуется: Империум — поборник
Получая {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} от противника, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} 5% к урону, который он наносит этому противнику {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционными{/g} атаками. Если противник является демоном или ксеносом, бонус увеличивается в <u>уровень Империума</u> раз.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 信奉者が必要
敵の攻撃が使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}するたび、使用者はその敵に対する範囲攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に5%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。対ディーモンまたは異種族では、このボーナスは<u>教条主義ランク</u>の倍数に増える。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

traits.locale_text:
帝国 ― 信奉者が必要
敵の攻撃が使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}するたび、使用者はその敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃ダメージに{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を5%獲得する。対ディーモンまたはゼノでは、このボーナスは<u>帝国ランク</u>の倍数に増える。

{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 信奉者が必要
敵の攻撃が使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}するたび、使用者はその敵に対する{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に5%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を獲得する。対ディーモンまたはゼノでは、このボーナスは<u>教条主義ランク</u>の倍数に増える。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Devoto
Cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al portador, este obtiene +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ataque a distancia contra el mismo enemigo. Contra daemons o xenos, esta bonificación se multiplica por el rango de <u>Dogmático</u> del portador.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Imperialis: Devoto
Cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} al portador, este obtiene +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de daño de ataque a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} contra el mismo enemigo. Contra daemons o xenos, esta bonificación aumenta por cada <u>rango de Imperialis</u>.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} — Geweihter
Wenn ein Feind den Träger {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhält der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch Fernkampf-Angriffe gegen diesen Feind. Gegen Dämonen und Xenos wird dieser Bonus um den <u>Dogmatiker-Rang</u> des Trägers erhöht.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Imperialis – Geweihter
Immer wenn ein Feind den Träger {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, erhält der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 % auf Schaden durch {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriffe gegen diesen Feind. Gegen Dämonen und Xenos wird dieser Bonus um ein Vielfaches des <u>Imperialis-Rangs</u> erhöht.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Disciple.
Chaque fois qu'une frappe de l'ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} l'utilisateur, ce dernier obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à distance de +5 % contre cet ennemi. Contre les démons ou les xénos, ce bonus est multiplié par le <u>rang Dogmatique</u> de l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert Imperialis — Disciple.
Chaque fois qu'une frappe de l'ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteint{/g} l'utilisateur, ce dernier reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} de +5 % pour contrer cet ennemi. Contre les démons ou les xénos, ce bonus est multiplié par <u>rang Imperialis</u>.

Requiert Imperialis — Disciple.
Chaque fois qu'une frappe de l'ennemi {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}atteint{/g} l'utilisateur, ce dernier reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} de +5 % pour contrer cet ennemi. Contre les démons ou les xénos, ce bonus est multiplié par <u>rang Imperialis</u>.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Coşkulu kanaati gerektirir
Bir düşman ne zaman takan kişiye {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vursa{/g} takan kişi, o düşmana karşı menzilli saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarına{/g} +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır. İblis veya zenolara karşı bu bonus, takan kişinin <u>Dogmatik kademesi</u> ile çarpılır.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.
